id.description: SPM Internal computed usage Id , 32 character string

timeCreated.description: Computed Usage created time, expressed in RFC 3339 timestamp format.

timeUpdated.description: Computed Usage updated time, expressed in RFC 3339 timestamp format.

rateCardTierdId.description: References the tier in the ratecard for that usage (OCI will be using the same reference to cross-reference for correctness on the usage csv report), comes from Entity OBSCNTR_IPT_PRODUCTTIER.

rateCardId.description: Ratecard Id at subscribed service level

dataCenter.description: Data Center Attribute as sent by MQS to SPM.

mqsMessageId.description: MQS Identifier send to SPM , SPM does not transform this attribute and is received as is.

quantity.description: Total Quantity that was used for computation

usageNumber.description: SPM Internal usage Line number identifier in SPM coming from Metered Services entity.

originalUsageNumber.description: SPM Internal Original usage Line number identifier in SPM coming from Metered Services entity.

isInvoiced.description: Invoicing status for the aggregated compute usage

timeOfArrival.description: Usae computation date, expressed in RFC 3339 timestamp format.

timeMeteredOn.description: Metered Service date, expressed in RFC 3339 timestamp format.

netUnitPrice.description: Net Unit Price for the product in consideration, price actual.

ucmRateCardPartType.description: Rate card part type of Product

isBillTo.description: Identify as the customer's billing address.

isShipTo.description: Identify as the customer's shipping address.

name.description: Commercial name also called customer name.

isPublicSector.description: The business partner is part of the public sector or not.

isChainCustomer.description: The business partner is chain customer or not.

createdBy.description: User that created the Payment term

updatedBy.description: User that updated the Payment term

ucmRateCardPartType.description: Rate card part type of Product

id.description: The unique identifier for the listing in Marketplace.

shortDescription.description: A short description of the listing.

longDescription.description: A long description of the listing.

licenseModelDescription.description: A description of the publisher's licensing model for the listing.

timeReleased.description: The release date of the listing.

categories.description: Categories that the listing belongs to.

supportContacts.description: Contact information to use to get support from the publisher for the listing.

supportLinks.description: Links to support resources for the listing.

documentationLinks.description: Links to additional documentation provided by the publisher specifically for the listing.

compatibleArchitectures.description: The list of compatible architectures supported by the listing

regions.description: The regions where you can deploy the listing. (Some listings have restrictions that limit their deployment to United States regions only.)

isFeatured.description: Indicates whether the listing is included in Featured Listings.

listingType.description: The publisher category to which the listing belongs. The publisher category informs where the listing appears for use.

supportedOperatingSystems.description: List of operating systems supported by the listing.

Listing.description: Listing The model for an Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Marketplace listing.

id.description: Unique OCID identifier for the listing revision in Marketplace Publisher.

listingId.description: The unique identifier for the listing this revision belongs to.

displayName.description: The name for the listing revision.

headline.description: Single line introduction for the listing revision.

timeCreated.description: The time the listing revision was created. An RFC3339 formatted datetime string.

timeUpdated.description: The time the listing revision was updated. An RFC3339 formatted datetime string.

categories.description: The categories for the listing revision.

status.description: The current status for the Listing revision.

lifecycleState.description: The current state of the listing revision.

packageType.description: The listing's package type. Populated from the listing.

pricingType.description: The pricing model for the listing revision.

compartmentId.description: The unique identifier for the compartment.

revisionNumber.description: The revision number for the listing revision. This is an internal attribute

tagline.description: The tagline of the listing revision.

keywords.description: Keywords associated with the listing revision.

shortDescription.description: A short description for the listing revision.

usageInformation.description: Usage information for the listing revision.

longDescription.description: A long description for the listing revision.

systemRequirements.description: System requirements for the listing revision.

markets.description: The markets supported by the listing revision.

supportedlanguages.description: Languages supported by the publisher for the listing revision.

supportContacts.description: Contact information to use to get support from the publisher for the listing revision.

supportLinks.description: Links to support resources for the listing revision.

statusNotes.description: Status notes for the listing revision.

allowedTenancies.description: Allowed tenancies provided when a listing revision is published as private.

areInternalTenancyLaunchAllowed.description: Identifies whether publisher allows internal tenancy launches for the listing revision.

extendedMetadata.description: Additional metadata key/value pairs for the listing revision summary.

freeformTags.description:
Simple key-value pair that is applied without any predefined name, type or scope. Exists for cross-compatibility only.
Example: `{"bar-key": "value"}`

definedTags.description:
Defined tags for this resource. Each key is predefined and scoped to a namespace.
Example: `{"foo-namespace": {"bar-key": "value"}}`

systemTags.description:
System tags for this resource. Each key is predefined and scoped to a namespace.
Example: `{"orcl-cloud": {"free-tier-retained": "true"}}`

ListingRevision.description: ListingRevision The model for an Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Marketplace Publisher listing revision.

id.description: The unique OCID of the listing.

compartmentId.description: The unique identifier of the compartment.

listingType.description: The listing type of the Listing.

lifecycleState.description: The current state for the Listing.

packageType.description: The package type for the listing.

timeCreated.description:
The date and time the listing was created, in the format defined by RFC3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339).
Example: `2023-03-27T21:10:29.600Z`

timeUpdated.description:
The date and time the listing was updated, in the format defined by RFC3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339).
Example: `2023-03-27T21:10:29.600Z`

freeformTags.description:
Simple key-value pair that is applied without any predefined name, type or scope. Exists for cross-compatibility only.
Example: `{"bar-key": "value"}`

definedTags.description:
Defined tags for this resource. Each key is predefined and scoped to a namespace.
Example: `{"foo-namespace": {"bar-key": "value"}}`

systemTags.description:
System tags for this resource. Each key is predefined and scoped to a namespace.
Example: `{"orcl-cloud": {"free-tier-retained": "true"}}`

ListingSummary.description: ListingSummary The model for a summary of the publisher listing.

categoryCode.description: The category code of the market.

billToCountries.description: bill to countries for the market.

lifecycleState.description: The current state for the market.

timeCreated.description:
The date and time the market was created, in the format defined by RFC3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339).
Example: `2022-09-15T21:10:29.600Z`

timeUpdated.description:
The date and time the market was updated, in the format defined by RFC3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339).
Example: `2022-09-15T21:10:29.600Z`

realmCode.description: The realm code of the market.

Market.description: Market The model for the market details.

compartmentId.description: The OCID (https://docs.cloud.oracle.com/Content/General/Concepts/identifiers.htm) of the compartment where the publication exists.

id.description: The unique identifier for the publication in Marketplace.

name.description: The name of the publication, which is also used in the listing.

listingType.description: The publisher category to which the publication belongs. The publisher category informs where the listing appears for use.

lifecycleState.description: The lifecycle state of the publication.

shortDescription.description: A short description of the publication to use in the listing.

longDescription.description: A long description of the publication to use in the listing.

supportContacts.description: Contact information for getting support from the publisher for the listing.

supportedOperatingSystems.description: The list of operating systems supported by the listing.

timeCreated.description:
The date and time the publication was created, expressed in RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339)
timestamp format.
Example: `2016-08-25T21:10:29.600Z`

definedTags.description:
The defined tags associated with this resource, if any. Each key is predefined and scoped to namespaces.
For more information, see Resource Tags (https://docs.cloud.oracle.com/iaas/Content/General/Concepts/resourcetags.htm).
Example: `{"Operations": {"CostCenter": "42"}}`

freeformTags.description:
The freeform tags associated with this resource, if any. Each tag is a simple key-value pair with no
predefined name, type, or namespace. For more information, see Resource Tags (https://docs.cloud.oracle.com/iaas/Content/General/Concepts/resourcetags.htm).
Example: `{"Department": "Finance"}`

systemTags.description:
The system tags associated with this resource, if any. The system tags are set by Oracle Cloud Infrastructure services. Each key is predefined and scoped to namespaces.
For more information, see Resource Tags (https://docs.cloud.oracle.com/iaas/Content/General/Concepts/resourcetags.htm).
Example: `{orcl-cloud: {free-tier-retain: true}}`

Publication.description: Publication The model for an Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Marketplace publication.

id.description: Unique OCID identifier for the publisher.

compartmentId.description: The root compartment of the Publisher.

registryNamespace.description: The namespace for the publisher registry to persist artifacts.

contactEmail.description: The public email address of the publisher for customers.

contactPhone.description: The phone number of the publisher in E.164 format.

timeCreated.description: The time the publisher was created. An RFC3339 formatted datetime string.

timeUpdated.description: The time the publisher was updated. An RFC3339 formatted datetime string.

legacyId.description: Unique legacy service identifier for the publisher.

yearFounded.description: The year the publisher's company or organization was founded.

hqAddress.description: The address of the publisher's headquarters.

freeformTags.description:
Simple key-value pair that is applied without any predefined name, type or scope. Exists for cross-compatibility only.
Example: `{"bar-key": "value"}`

definedTags.description:
Defined tags for this resource. Each key is predefined and scoped to a namespace.
Example: `{"foo-namespace": {"bar-key": "value"}}`

systemTags.description:
System tags for this resource. Each key is predefined and scoped to a namespace.
Example: `{"orcl-cloud": {"free-tier-retained": "true"}}`

notificationEmail.description: The private email address of the publisher product team.

Publisher.description: Publisher The model for a publisher details.

id.description: The unique identifier for the publisher.

PublisherSummary.description: PublisherSummary Summary details about the publisher of the listing.

phone.description: The phone number of the contact.

subject.description: The email subject line to use when contacting support.

SupportContact.description: SupportContact Contact information to use to get support.
